thread.title: Harvest Moon: The Lost Valley & Skytree Village Delayed to July 3 on Switch
thread.title_full: Harvest Moon: The Lost Valley & Skytree Village Delayed to July 3 on Switch

author: Orpheus Joshua
title: Harvest Moon: The Lost Valley & Skytree Village Delayed to July 3 on Switch
text:
Natsume has announced that Harvest Moon: The Lost Valley & Skytree Village has been delayed from June 2025 to July 3, 2025, for Nintendo Switch.
CEO Hiro Maekawa said the following:
We look forward to bringing Harvest Moon: The Lost Valley and Harvest Moon: Skytree Village to Nintendo Switch on July 3 as we release our first Cozy Bundle.
The team has been working hard on optimizing these 3DS titles for Switch, ensuring high quality and updated features. We hope this will be the first of many bundles featuring classic Natsume games that fans have been wanting to play on modern consoles.
This collection includes Harvest Moon: The Lost Valley and Harvest Moon: Skytree Village , which are now together on one game card. Both games feature terrain customization, farming, relationships, and exploration.
Harvest Moon: The Lost Valley Initially released in 2014 for the Nintendo 3DS, The Lost Valley follows a journey to restore the missing seasons of a magical valley.
After taking shelter from a snowstorm, you awaken to a world where winter never ends, and with the help of Harvest Sprites, the Harvest Goddess, and the King of the Underworld, you set out to bring balance back to nature.
Features:
Farm and raise animals – Grow crops and care for cows, chickens, and sheep. Customize the terrain – Dig, build, and reshape the land. Harness the power of Harvest Sprites Find love and start a family – Build relationships, get married, and raise a child. All DLC included – Extra outfits, buildings, crops, and additional characters. Harvest Moon: Skytree Village Released in 2016 for the Nintendo 3DS, Skytree Village takes players to a once-thriving land now suffering from drought and decay. The Harvest Goddess has lost her power, and only by reviving the seven Skytrees can the land be restored.
Features:
Meet and befriend villagers Fully customize the land Romance & marriage – Choose from multiple bachelors and bachelorettes. Expanded farming & fishing – Grow new crops and flowers, improve waterways, and catch rare fish. All DLC included – Unlock additional characters and cosmetic items. Release & Collector’s Edition Harvest Moon: The Lost Valley & Skytree Village will be available both digitally and physically worldwide, with regional publishers as follows:
North America & Japan – Natsume Inc. Europe – Numskull Games Asia – Soft Source Numskull Games’ Collector’s Edition (Europe) will include:
The game (Switch physical copy) 2 Sticker Sheets 2 Diorama Backgrounds (to place stickers on) Original Soundtrack CD A4 Double-Sided Poster
